CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Buyer_Contact__c )), TEXT(Buyer_Contact__r.Salutation) & ' ' & Buyer_Contact__r.FirstName & ' ' & Buyer_Contact__r.LastName & ' & ' & TEXT( Secondary_Buyer_Tenant__r.Salutation ) & ' ' & Secondary_Buyer_Tenant__r.FirstName & ' ' & Secondary_Buyer_Tenant__r.LastName ,NULL )
CustomField.label: Buyer Contact Name
